short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your potential into progress with a beautifully simple start page by FlashTabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Give a clean and modern look to your default Chrome homepage

FlashTabs replaces the default homepage of Chrome/Brave Browser and turns it into powerful personal new tab, you'd love to use everyday.
Customize it in the way, you want, set category preferences of dozens of the beautiful backgrounds. Enjoy a clean and modern look of calendar, reminder and ToDo, delivered in NewTab.
Turn your Chrome Startpage into the most beautiful and powerful utility of your browser with Moment Dashboard.

Features:

- ToDo
- Add Focus of the Day
- Google Search
- Customizable Background preferences
